input_text:
Job Title: Account Manager

Location: Providence County, RI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
You could be the one who changes everything for our 28 million members. Centene is transforming the health of our communities, one person at a time. As a diversified, national organization, youâ€™ll have access to competitive benefits including a fresh perspective on workplace flexibility.

***NOTE We are seeking candidates with a strong background in healthcare Account Management***

Position Purpose Act as Primary Point of Contact operating health plan markets and operational departments such as Care Management, Disease Management, Nurse Advice Line and BH Crisis Line, and allow the Operations teams to focus on running the day-to-day business operations.

 Manage and maintain assigned account relationships (health plan markets and product team) and service responsibilities Work with Operations staff as needed, to resolve problems or complaints identified by accounts and manage account issues to closure Provide support and strategic business insights about products and services to management, peers and clients health plan leadership

Collaborate with the project management team during implementations and in the establishment of strong account relationships while ensuring a smooth transition of services for members.

 Provide training to account staff as needed on the use and function of the products and services Coordinate the design, development and rollout of service enhancements and related projects as requested by accounts Interpret data and share Operational results with Health Plan Markets or Product Leadership during regularly scheduled meetings and communications with market leadership Leverage experience with Managed Care Organizations or Lines of Business such as Marketplace, Medicare or Medicaid, to provide valuable insights or opportunities for improvement. Coordinate the tracking of all account related complaints/concerns and ensure timely follow-up, including resolution with all appropriate operations, cross functional and/or market staff Assist in the development and completion of Account Corrective Action Plans Support the markets with knowledge and data during RFP's Ability to travel

Education/Experience Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience 5+ years of related account management, client services or other related experience. Previous experience as a lead in a functional area, managing cross functional teams on large scale projects or supervisory experience including hiring, training, assigning work and managing the performance of staff. Experience with Managed Care Operations or account management experience with Marketplace, Medicare or Medicaid strongly preferred.

Pay Range $67,400.00 - $121,300.00 per year

Centene offers a comprehensive benefits package including competitive pay, health insurance, 401K and stock purchase plans, tuition reimbursement, paid time off plus holidays, and a flexible approach to work with remote, hybrid, field or office work schedules. Actual pay will be adjusted based on an individual's skills, experience, education, and other job-related factors permitted by law. Total compensation may also include additional forms of incentives.

Centene is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity, and values the ways in which we are different. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or other characteristic protected by applicable law.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Account Manager
output_json.summary: Centene is seeking an experienced Account Manager to manage and maintain relationships with health plan markets and operational departments.
optional_skills: Account management experience with Marketplace, Medicare or Medicaid
soft_skills: Strong background in healthcare Account Management
job_responsibilities: Manage and maintain assigned account relationships
Work with Operations staff to resolve problems or complaints
Provide support and strategic business insights
Collaborate with project management team during implementations
Coordinate service enhancements and related projects
Provide training on products and services
Interpret data and share operational results
Leverage experience with Managed Care Organizations
Assist in development and completion of Account Corrective Action Plans
Support markets with knowledge and data during RFP's
output_json.company_information: Centene is a diversified, national organization offering competitive benefits including workplace flexibility.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Centene is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity.
